GSD.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
intel_th: msu: Fix vmalloced buffers

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 4914c50670b6a531e2cb17cd984cc565b4681312, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit ba39bd8306057fb343dfb75d93a76d824b625236. For more details please see the references link.
